name: Bandwidth 3D Breakout
description:
IT´S A FUN BREAKOUT CLONE WITH BANDWIDTH AND 3D GRAPHICS.

I DIDNT EVEN MAKE ENTIRELY THE CODE I JUST EDITED GRAPHICS FROM A CLICKTEAM TUTORIAL AND THAT IS NOT COOL.

Fangame made by David Sosa using some of the code from a Clickteam game tutorial.

All right reserved from code to Clickteam

Some edits to code and some original assets: David Sosa

Graphics used for bars and menus: ash https://ashm.dev/

Bandwidth graphics and creator: Spring  (springblitz)

Special thanks for Microsoft (3D model for heart icon) and Nintendo (creating wii u)

Also, if you have a Wii U (or Cemu), don´t doubt and install Pretendo Network right now to get early access to some revival services like SMM level uploads, Wii U Chat and Miiverse (juxt is down atm)

Enter right now here at https://pretendo.network/ and don´t forget to donate to get access to beta servers!

Join Pretendo Discord and follow them in social media:

https://discord.com/invite/DThgbba

https://twitter.com/PretendoNetwork

sorry marisa and furryvile please dont ban me i made this game as a sowwy
